categories.title: Text manipulation
categories.description: Functions that manipulate and modify the text in a variable

steps.title: Find and replace in a value
steps.description: Replace all instances of a found string in your text with another value. (Tip: This can be empty to delete characters)

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: What value or text do you want to find and replace text in? (Tip: You would use '{{@varName}}' to enter the variable 'varName')

parameters.display_name: String of characters to find for
parameters.name: find
parameters.description: What text exists in the Starting value that you want to replace?

parameters.display_name: Value to replace all instances found of the string of characters with
parameters.name: replace
parameters.description: What text do you watch to replace the found string of characters with in the Starting value?

steps.title: Remove accents from value
steps.description: Replaces all accented characters in a string with the non-accented version

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value you want to remove the accents from

categories.title: Working with Lists
categories.description: Steps that provide control over a list of values with a separator, such as comma separated values

steps.title: Find the length of a list
steps.description: Returns the number of elements in a list

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: The list you want the length of

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: The character that separates the values in your list

steps.title: Get nth element from a list
steps.description: Returns an element from a given list at the given index (Great for interating through a list in your loops!)

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: The list from which you'd like to find an element

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The position in the list from which you'd like the element

steps.title: Sort a list
steps.description: Sorts a list in ascending/alphabetical order

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: The list you want to sort
